user.title: Connect to Contact Energy API
user.description: Enter the URL of your Contact Energy API service. This should be the FastAPI service that fetches data from Contact Energy.

data_description.api_url: The URL of the Contact Energy API service (e.g., http://localhost:8000)

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to the API. Please check the URL and ensure the service is running.
error.no_accounts: No Contact Energy accounts found. Please check your API service configuration.

abort.already_configured: This Contact Energy account is already configured.

sync.name: Sync Data
sync.description: Trigger a manual sync to fetch the latest usage data from Contact Energy.

backfill.name: Backfill Historical Data
backfill.description: Fetch all available historical data from Contact Energy. This may take several minutes.

import_statistics.name: Import Statistics
import_statistics.description: Import historical data into Home Assistant's long-term statistics for charting and the Energy Dashboard.
